markdownRemark.html:
“So, who wants to be the scrum master?”

Agile has become a staple in development teams over the past few years. Of the few popular frameworks out there most companies seem to implement Scrum.

Over the past few years I’ve spent time both as a member of a scrum team, and the person leading one.

Organisation

Proactiveness

Communication

frontmatter.title: Creating a Widget Wrapper with React's createPortal
